result.execSummary:
The defendant Darrell L. Fair Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Darrell L. Fair Jr is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Darrell L. Fair Jr was found guilty of Armed Robbery [Modifiers: Repeater], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: If probation or extended supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.  This applies to all counts and financial obligations.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.  Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not possess or consume controlled substances, except by prescription.  Submit voluntarily to random tests of blood, breath or urine.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by agent.  Counseling shall specifically include:  AODA Assessment and follow through with recommended treatment.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.
**  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
Submit a DNA sample (unless previously provided)
** Pay DNA surcharge (unless previously paid).  May Not have contact with Matthew F or Brittany L unless otherwise permitted by the court/agent.  May not possess any weapons, including firearms.

records.addlTxt: For restitution order - file by ADA M Graveley
Extended Supervision Conditions-ordered by the court

Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Perz.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  State in victim compliance.  Court imposes a total sentence of 18 years WSP concurrent to 15CM448 & 14CF910; 10 years initial confinement w/credit for 353 days served; 8 years extended supervision w/conditions; deft is eligible for CIP/SAP; submit DNA sample and pay $250 DNA surcharge; restitution ordered in the amount of $130 (by stipulation of deft).

Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Perz.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  On State's motion, ct 2 is dismissed.  Deft pleads guilty.  Court finds deft guilty.  PSI ordered.  DNA sample ordered.  SEH 7/24/15 at 11am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Perz.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Perz states he has a report from the Dr, requests a short adjournment to attempt to work out a global resolution.  FPT continued to 6/5/15 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Perz.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Perz states an expert has been hired, is waiting on records, then the Dr can prepare a report and then they can work toward resolution of the case.  FPT continued to 5/28/15 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Perz.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Perz states they are in negotiations; states he intends to hire a psychologist.  FPT continued to 4/9/15 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Perz.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Perz states there have been further negotiations that he needs time to discuss w/deft.  FPT continued to 2/19/15 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Perz.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Perz states he relayed an offer to ADA Graveley, who has been in trial, so they are still in negotiations.  FPT continued to 1/29/15 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Perz.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Perz states the investigator is still doing followup on this case.  FPT continued to 12/18/14 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Defendant Darrell L. Fair appeared with Attorney Matthew J. Perz.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Michael David Graveley appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk: N. Jurgens. 
MINUTES: KPD Detective J. Hecker sworn in and testified. ST moves for bind over; Atty Perz objects. The Court finds there is probable cause and binds the case over to Br 6.  Information filed, reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Bond continued. This case set to trail defendant's other case 14CF910.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 17, 2014 at 01:30 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 6, 2014 at 08:15 am.

1:42 pm    Attorney James Kraus appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Matt Perz.  Clerk:  LE.    Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Comm Mason on 9-5-14 @ 10:00 am.  Bond continued.

2:02 pm    Attorney Patricia Riley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Angela Komp.  Clerk: LE.    Initial appearance adjourned to 8-28-14 @ 1:00pm w/Comm Mason, 927-54th Street, Rm 157, Kenosha, WI.  RE:  Atty status.  $50,000 cash bond set with conditions.

*No Weapons.  *No Contact w/ Matthew F or Brittany L or their residences.
